document.title: Business Application Form Structure
document.description: A comprehensive form structure for automating customer feedback collection through AI-powered forms.

explanation: The form structure consists of a root form that serves as the central hub for collecting high-level business information and connecting to subforms. Each subform focuses on specific aspects of the business goals, such as customer satisfaction tracking, feedback analysis, and user onboarding. The root form uses relation fields to link to these subforms, ensuring a logical and organized hierarchy. This structure aligns with the business goals by enabling efficient data collection and analysis.

forms.name: business_information
forms.title: Business Information
forms.description: Collect general information about the business and connect to detailed subforms.

fields.name: business_name
fields.title: Business Name
fields.description: Enter the name of your business.

fields.name: industry
fields.title: Industry
fields.description: Select the industry your business operates in.

fields.name: website
fields.title: Website
fields.description: Provide the URL of your business website.

fields.name: customer_feedback_form
fields.title: Customer Feedback Form
fields.description: Link to the form for collecting customer feedback.

fields.name: feedback_analysis_form
fields.title: Feedback Analysis Form
fields.description: Link to the form for analyzing feedback data.

fields.name: user_onboarding_form
fields.title: User Onboarding Form
fields.description: Link to the form for collecting user onboarding details.

forms.name: customer_feedback
forms.title: Customer Feedback
forms.description: Collect feedback from customers about their experience.

fields.name: customer_name
fields.title: Customer Name
fields.description: Enter the name of the customer providing feedback.

fields.name: feedback_date
fields.title: Feedback Date
fields.description: Select the date the feedback was provided.

forms.name: feedback_analysis
forms.title: Feedback Analysis
forms.description: Analyze the feedback data collected from customers.

fields.name: analysis_date
fields.title: Analysis Date
fields.description: Enter the date of the feedback analysis.

fields.name: total_feedbacks
fields.title: Total Feedbacks
fields.description: Enter the total number of feedbacks analyzed.

fields.name: positive_feedback_percentage
fields.title: Positive Feedback Percentage
fields.description: Enter the percentage of positive feedback.

fields.name: key_insights
fields.title: Key Insights
fields.description: Summarize the key insights from the feedback analysis.

forms.name: user_onboarding
forms.title: User Onboarding
forms.description: Collect details about the user onboarding process.

fields.name: user_name
fields.title: User Name
fields.description: Enter the name of the user being onboarded.

fields.name: onboarding_date
fields.title: Onboarding Date
fields.description: Select the date the user was onboarded.

fields.name: onboarding_steps_completed
fields.title: Onboarding Steps Completed
fields.description: Indicate whether the user completed all onboarding steps.

fields.name: onboarding_feedback
fields.title: Onboarding Feedback
fields.description: Provide feedback about the onboarding process.
